website_summaries.verdict: A good choice for consumers with damaged skin or those that want noticeable results faster than some other products can deliver. However, irritation is possible, especially for those with sensitive skin.
pros: Contains 20% ascorbic acid, thought to be the most potent form of vitamin C, making it highly effective at producing noticeable results
Includes hyaluronic and ferulic acid that moisturize and plump up fine lines
made in the U.S.A. without animal testing
cons: The downside of ascorbic acid is that it can be irritating to the skin, and tends to oxidate faster than other forms of vitamin C. Feels sticky

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Skinceuticals C and Ferulic for years tried this one at a fraction of the cost and don't see any difference even the ingredients are the same.
customer_reviews.author: Lana K.

customer_reviews.title: ph not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The company advertises a pH of 3.2 for this product but when I got the bottle, I gave it a good shake and measured the pH. I got around 5 both times. So that's too high, even factoring in the accuracy variation of the pH strip.
customer_reviews.author: P. Martineau

customer_reviews.title: Burning pinching and redness 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: I was so hopeful when I read the reviews as well as info on the internet. BUT when I used this serum my skin burned, pinched, and turned red. I thought it would stop in a minute or two but it didn’t. I had to wash it off. My nose got especially red. Even after washing it off I could still feel the pinching. Advice! If you plan to purchase this DO A PATCH TEST first. I wish I had. Will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Product was received clumpy and yellow.
customer_reviews.text: I received this product a month ago and started using it. I normally use a different brand but decided to give this one a try after reading the positive reviews. First issue was when I opened the bottle it was all clumpy and yellowish. I thought I would try it on my skin for a week to see if was still effective and my skin began to itch, burn and turn red. I normally purchase the “Timeless” brand and have never had an issue. I would like to stick with this brand and hope that it’s only the case of a bad bottle. I would be willing to try another bottle and hopefully change review to 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Mystery Ingredients they won’t disclose — no thanks.
customer_reviews.text: This product’s description is misleading, as the actual bottle has a mysterious herbal blend that they will not disclose what it actually is on the ingredients. Beware. No good skincare hides their ingredients. What if you injure someone due to an allergy? As someone with allergies this was extremely misleading and disappointing, not to mention false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda I.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I am 34 and looking for a more adult like skin care regimen. My dermatologist prescribed recommend a vitamin c serum. I was about to bite the bullet on the skinceuticals vitamin c serum ($166!) but decided I give this a try when I saw it on lightening deal. I love it. Perfect consistency. Makes me skin feel firm and dewey. It's the middle of January here in the Midwest and the air is DRY! I felt like this has provided good moisture. Give it a try! Not much to lose for $16.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this product changes each time u order it so i don’t what i’m using at this point!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you can take the odor on your skin, then this is likely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Gotta be honest...this stuff smells bad on your skin...not unlike other brands I've tried with Ferulic acid. It smells much like your hands do when you handle a bunch of coins--but it's on your face and way to close to your nose! After a month's use, I do find that it has brightened my skin a bit, but I really can't get past the odor. While Ferulic acid is supposed to help enhance Vitamin C, I just don't know if the payoff is worth it for me. I find myself wanting to use it but then deciding not to because of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: JElle

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me! Smoother, brighter and clearer facial skin.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 63 years old. I used this vitamin C serum a full week before I added a non-soap cleanser, a rosewater & witchazel toner and a Retinol & hyaluronic moisturizer to my facial routine. After years of neglect my face responded immediately with wonderful results. The first week with just this serum I noticed my face was smoother, brighter and bit more even toned. All my miscellaneous lumps and bumps were noticeably reduced. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!  "Sunspots" on my hands are completely GONE!
customer_reviews.text: I am very, very vain about my hands, so I was horrified to realize that I had two age spots on my left hand. My California friends call them "sun spots" - but you KNOW what I mean! After using less than a drop each morning for less than two weeks, I now cannot FIND the sun spots to continue "treating" them. I am astonished and very pleased. Wow!
customer_reviews.author: Maria in Macon

customer_reviews.title: Caused my skin to break out
customer_reviews.text: This is a really bad product and I am really confused by all of the good reviews. The product has an odd odor which, while not great, I was willing to overlook. This biggest issue is that it irritated my skin and caused my skin to breakout. It's horrible and depressing. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came oxidized
customer_reviews.text: This product came oxidized already. The liquid is supposed to be crystal clear. I had bought this same one on Walmart. I bought another one through Amazon, because the one I had started to oxidize. This one came completely yellow and thick. Bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: michc

customer_reviews.title: Itching and Burning Skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different Vitamin C serums and I have never had one irritate my face like this product did. I don’t know why this happened but whenever I would apply the product I would get a burning and itching sensation all over my face, I tried to tough it out but it was unbearable. So I essentially wasted $20 on this product, unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Terra

customer_reviews.title: Did not seem QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I have sampled other serums at Sephora and Ulta, not purchased mind you, but lots of samples. This serum seemed totally ineffective, thin, and irritated my skin. I usually use items like this near my eyes and mouth. Firstly, it is not even a "proper" consistency. Mine was very thin, almost ran like water. In addition, there was minimal absorption or melding with the skin. It just sorta sits there. I think for quality I will spend a bit more money next time.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Green

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY- IT RUINS YOUR SKIN
customer_reviews.text: It burned my skin and turned it red!! And then i broke out and it itched!! never using this again :(
customer_reviews.author: Alice Cooper

customer_reviews.title: I think might be nice for a Vit C beginner
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Vit C for a long time and decided to try this as I was in need and quickly so as a Prime member I chose this. I love to use Vitamin C daily and feel it really helps my maturing, dry, 58 year old skin on many levels. Ppl need to work their way up when using C and I think this was not potent enough (although the title appears it would be) or it just may be the wrong item for me. No scent, absorbs nicely... didn't see the same skin after using this as with the 2 other I use on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: TravelerTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Radiance for Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a number of different L-ascorbic serums over the years, and this one takes the cake! Potent Vit C, Vit E, ferulic acid, and a price point to die for? Yup! And it arrives deliciously crystal-clear and pungent (the unfortunate mark of an effective C-serum lol). It’s tough to find a great serum you can afford to replace when it oxidizes, and this is not only that affordable, but it gets results better than anything else I’ve tried!
customer_reviews.author: maryamelia

customer_reviews.title: Great but for the effect
customer_reviews.text: Smells like the Skinceutical version amd feels mostly like it and ingredients are very similar. However I am a brand snob and do believe I saw more results with the other but at exactly $159 more per bottle and that I use this from all my chest to forehead I'll take my chances on this brand and be able to buy all the time and in quantities. I do think it smooths the skin and feels good. Just not sure im getting the same level of peeling action I got with the pricier version. For now I'll be buying this one.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonRae valdez

customer_reviews.title: Horrible for Melasma! Reversed 2 months of progress.
customer_reviews.text: When I first ordered this and tried it, the serum burned my skin. I stopped using it immediately and started with prescription Triluma. I had great progress and my melasma practically disappeared over 2 months. I decided to try the Vitamin C serum again ... BIG MISTAKE!!!! One night of the serum and my melasma (deep dark spots) is back full force. Horrible and scary. I should know better ... this is the last time I order something like this online. Unfortunately a frustrating example of what can go wrong with cheap products. Buyers beware!
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, I've been using for almost 2 weeks and the age spots are lightening. Obviously vitamin C is not a quick fix, but over time it's a fabulous product to improve skin texture and evening out skin tone. I like the consistency, not too runny and glides on easily. The true test is how long will it last before oxidizing, hopefully until I use it all up.
customer_reviews.author: Long Tall Texan

customer_reviews.title: Smells like dog treats
customer_reviews.text: I had a pimple on my face and after a few hours, it was almost gone. But I put this serum on after washing my face and the smell was so strong I couldn’t relax and sleep with it on. It smells like I dipped my face into a bag of “beggin strips” dog treats ... nasty. I want to keep using this product because of the benefits.. but I’ll have to use something else on top of it because of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: josie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The product was clear (thus not oxidized) when I received it, but it is already starting to turn orange (oxidized) after a little over a month. I’m super disappointed because that means I’ll have to throw almost half of the bottle away. I really liked that the product contained the right balance of Vit C, Vit E, and ferulic acid because together those have been scientifically shown to be 8x more effective against sun damage than Vit C alone.
customer_reviews.author: carisa merchant

customer_reviews.title: It's got all the good stuff in it
customer_reviews.text: I had been using other vitamin C serums, but then found out only vitamin C in L-ascorbic acid form absorbed well into the skin and had evidence supporting antioxidant effects. So then I started doing a bunch of research and came across this one. It's got triple antioxidant activity plus hyaluronic acid for moisture, similar to another more expensive brand. It doesn't dry my face out, and I think it's helping protect my skin under my sunscreen, although there hasn't been a noticeable before and after effect since I started using this serum. I use it everyday and get it through Amazon's 'subscribe and save' program.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Oxidizes Quickly!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product would be great if it gave me the chance to use it. Just after receiving it a few weeks ago, it has already turned yellow. I took extra precautions such as keeping it out of the sun and wrapping it in aluminum foil. It does not last long at all and I basically had to throw out the bottle with barely any used.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Save your money and buy this!
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of research decided to try this. Wasn’t too keen on purchasing a serum for 100 dollars or more and the cheaper ones on amazon have a lot of unnecessary ingredients. Was looking for L ascorbic acid and this has it. Have used over the past 8 months and have noticed an improvement in my skins overall evenness, texture, and brightness. I’m also experiencing less acne breakouts! I honestly feel like my skin is the most hydrated and even it has ever been thanks to this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin C serum re-builds collagen production for a more youthful look
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why the percentage of vitamin C isn't on the label. I can't trust the amount of vitamin C in this serum based solely from the Amazon listing and not on shown on the bottle. Also, why so many chemicals? Other products don't use so many chemicals to stabilize the L-Ascorbic acid from oxidation. Ferulic Acid, natural vitamin E and a combination of other derivatives of vitamin C will help prevent oxidation. The ph must be 3.5 or less to be effective. Once I use up the product I will no longer purchase it in the future unless changes are made.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t seen results, smells weird
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product with the hope that it would help even and brighten my skin tone, and maybe help with a few dark spots. I’ve been using it twice a day for about two weeks and haven’t personally noticed dramatic results. I’m about a quarter to a third of the way through the bottle. My skin is perhaps a little more luminous, which is nice, but I just thought that a 20% solution would be able to do more. My husband also insists that this smells horrible (I honestly don’t notice) and hates when I put it on at night.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Effective serum but horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: I'm 44 yo and I've been in surgical menopause for 2.5 yrs. Over the past several years I've been especially vigilant with my skincare and have used a handful of vitamin C serums (along with other serums) to help minimize the effects of early aging. While I think that this product is effective, I have a very difficult time using it due to its smell (which oddly smells like hotdog water). I also use the Hyaluronic Acid serum by this brand, which I like a lot and have no issue with how it smells.
customer_reviews.author: Live & Let Live

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the face and your pocket book
customer_reviews.text: I’m 48 with sun damage and watching all the skin cars videos I decide to start trying products to see if I could reverse the damage or some of it. I am fair complexion with sun damage and freckles & fine lines. I added this to my morning skin care routine and I’m loving the results. I have not had any bad reactions to it. I use on my face, neck, chest, and hands. Starting to see some spots lightening up.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Holder

customer_reviews.title: A true value for great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This product is such a great buy for the money! It has the best form of vitamin C (L-ascorbic acid) which is the one most proven effective in research. It’s clear, it doesn’t have a fragrance, and the consistency is thin and easily absorbed. I do suggest storing it in your refrigerator as vitamin C serum oxidizes quickly. Once it turns a yellow color, it’s starting to degrade. If it becomes dark yellow or brown you need to replace it. But at this price that’s easy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product a few times. The first bottle I used, the product was great and I saw slight improvement in my complexion with the product absorbing nicely into my skin. The second bottle, not as much improvement and looks as if different formula. However, overall, the product absorbs nicely and seems to be a good product with good ingredients. I will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Cheap substitute for Skinceuticals
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my mother (50yo), and have seen a drastic improvement in her skin! Smoother texture, less acne (she had cystic ones) and brighter tone! I had signed her up for a sample of the Skinceuticals Vit C serum which had removed her acne for weeks, but it was ~$200 per bottle! This had similar results for waaaaaay less, plus Amazon delivers! She had only used it for a month but the difference is amazing. Bottle is half-empty now--she applies it at night and during the day (under makeup). Will definitely reorder!
customer_reviews.author: Ari Es

customer_reviews.title: My skin LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried MANY moisturizers, including very expensive dermatological creams. This product is amazing, and works so much better than any moisturizer I have tried (yes, I know it is a serum). I am 54 with relatively dry skin especially in the winter. I experience some mild sensitivity, but it goes away after a bit. It makes my skin sooo soft, and has reduced lines as well. I use it in the evening only after cleansing with Kiehls. Worth the price. I will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: puppylover72

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle and all I can say is WOW! This product really does work. I've tried other vitamin C serums out there but I will be using this one from now on. It's affordable and is packaged securely. I also like the fact that it doesn't sting when applied to my skin and absorbs really fast. Plus, the content doesn't oxidize quickly unlike the others I've tried. I've already recommended this brand to my mom and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ros V

customer_reviews.title: Harsh, strong smell, burning, allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: LAST PICTURE IS MY SKIN BEFORE THE SERUM. BEFORE! I had a really bad allergic reaction. My cheeks and my forehead are full of small red bumps! It also burns a lot when you put it on. It has a strong and bad smell. I want to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela D'Almeida Lopes

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 2 months before oxidizing
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product helped with my PIH and PIE, but it's hard to tell because I've also been using other products along with it since I started. I have to warn however that my bottle oxidized after 7 weeks. Using a couple of drops a day, I still have more than 2/3s of the bottle left. I stored it in my bathroom cabinet away from light and heat. I will contact the company to see what they can offer and update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Yellow on arrival 😣
customer_reviews.text: This serum arrived a pale yellow color. It should be clear to be effective. Disappointed. It's a great formulation otherwise, but it's impossible to reap the benefits when it's no longer potent.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Helps with glow and wrinkles
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has helped my skin so much. I’ve never had glow-y skin before and I do now. It’s helped with moisture, acne, wrinkles, and overall skin health. I use a small amount in the morning after I wash my face and apply moisturizer and before I put on makeup, then at night I’ll do a tad more after I’ve washed my face and applied moisturizer again before I go to sleep. Make sure to not put too much on your skin or it gets too oily.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Effective and affordable topical ascorbic acid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it appears to be a perfect dupe for the SkinCeuticals vitamin C. Assuming that the label and pH are honest, then it is! Based on what I've read about the sensory characteristics of the SkinCeuticals serum - scent of hot dog water and slight tingling of the skin upon application, this product is effectively the same, but at an affordable price. I've noticed huge improvements in my skin texture, and I have had no issues with sensitivity or breakouts with this product (I have sensitive combo skin). I definitely recommend this for your vitamin C serum.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great, has the best ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Great, I put this on after I dermaroll, I would only do it if you don’t mind the burn, after Dermarolling your skin already starts to string but add anything else and it really burns so I put this on and then a vitamin c moisturizer to ease it. My skin is finally looking great though.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Product causes rash around mouth and neck.  Stings on application.  NOT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN !!
customer_reviews.text: Got a rash around mouth and on neck. Stings on application. Not for sensitive skin. The seller is not fair. I bought 3 bottles and he only reimbursed for two. I had confused this product with another vitamin c product which had helped me in the past, hence my reason for ordering 3 bottles which I intended to share with my mom and sister. So buyer be aware! Not a fair and honest seller!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and effective
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great serum. I use it every morning and it helps me maintain an even skintone. I can tell it's definitely l-ascorbic because me face tingles everytime I apply it after I shave. Just a side note, this serum (like all l-ascorbic acid serums) will start to turn yellow and oxidize. Do not baby it. Use as much as you need.
customer_reviews.author: Mchael D.

customer_reviews.title: Unlike other opinions, I DID find this serum oily
customer_reviews.text: Was trying to find replacement for Pure Body Naturals, which is aqueous and no longer available. While this product works, I find it oily like a vitamin E capsule and I don’t like the feel of it, especially in summer under sunscreen and makeup. I am continuing to look for a low cost C serum.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stugard

customer_reviews.title: Arrived oxidized
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this product because it's supposedly a dupe for the SkinCeuticals Vit C + Ferulic Acid but sadly, the product arrived oxidized. The serum is supposed to be clear but arrived yellow.
customer_reviews.author: M N

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this product, as my skin tends to like both hyaluronic acid and vitamin c in serums, but this was not for me. The texture is like water, so it is difficult to apply to the skin and, more importantly, it started burning my skin a couple seconds after application. I had to wash it off my face and was left with red patches. If your skin is sensitive, I'd stay away from this.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't purchase again. I have been using this type of product for quite a few years and have used different brands. This one actually started making my skin rough about 3/4s way through the bottle. I just switched to a new brand and after 3 days, my skin is bright, clear and tight again.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Glad I took a chance
customer_reviews.text: Glad I took a chance, product works great & feels great on skin. In fact, I reordered it to make sure I have enough for future use & plan to refrigerate it before opening. My only regret is I wish I had switched to this sooner, it's that good. That said, pls. keep the price at this level, bec, price is the only thing that would prohibit me from buying this in the future. Thanks, Dr. Brenner.
customer_reviews.author: Closet Hog

customer_reviews.title: My favorite basic C/HA serum; basic, no perfume, lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: Works great, gives a really nice finish to my skin and helps keep my complexion even and brightened. Doesn’t have a horrible perfume smell like other C serums I’ve tried. Also, the bottle lasts forever, daily use for 2 months and still have a little left. I’m on my third bottle and have tried at least 4 others; this is the best IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Be careful if you have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: You can definatly feel it tightening your skin. My SO did have a reaction to it though where their skin would have a slight burning feeling as well as redness. I don't experience any reaction like that, but be weary if you have very sensitive skin it may be too strong for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dupe for other pricey vitamin C serums out there...
customer_reviews.text: I tried this vitamin C serum after reading about how it is comparable to Skinceuticals $165 C serum. I was really impressed in the results and overall quality of this $16 serum, so I’m now on my second bottle and will continue to purchase it. I have also tried Dermadoctors Kakadu C serum ($98) and saw no difference in the results between these two products. I also received a squalane sample with my order, which I love and have already purchased the full size of as well. Awesome products at a fraction of the price!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Schott

customer_reviews.title: Depends on whether it arrives oxidized or not
customer_reviews.text: The last bottle i bought the formula was orange upon arrival and I just realized that meant it was oxidized. That sucks. Just ordered a new bottle and the formula was clear so I got a good batch this time. I really like Dr. Brenner's products and just wish i knew the last bottle was bad so I wouldn't have used the entire thing. Hope it wasn't bad for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: momandme

customer_reviews.title: Super stinky!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited about this product after reading some of the reviews. However, I could not get past the stink! It smells like the juice in a package of hot dogs. I tried using it for a few days, but I just could not deal with the smell. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Warneke

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Benner's serum works!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Dr. Benners Vitamin C serum for about 2 months. Since using, I really think my complexion looks smoother, thin lines are not noticeable and my skin feels tighter. The bottle last me over a month. The price is very reasonable. Plus another advantage is Dr. Benner's serum is part of the Subscribe and Save program for additional savings.
customer_reviews.author: C. Unger

customer_reviews.title: FACE BROKE OUT WHEN USED
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line - I used this product briefly - WHY - this product made my face break out. I am old school - don't wear makeup/skin care products. Thought it might be beneficial - PIMPLES! So, I will go back to just washing my face and forget the rest. In my opinion - COMEDOGENIC
customer_reviews.author: Inastateofflux

customer_reviews.title: Not clear at first opening
customer_reviews.text: I like getting a 20% bit. C at such a great price, live using it on my face. My first bottle was clear, then turned a yellow orange which is normal after opening Vitamin C. Ordered another one & it was already discolored yellow at first opening which makes me believe it wasn’t fresh, disappointing. Not sure wether to keep ordering or not.
customer_reviews.author: pelly

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried a few other vitamin c serums but this one was the best. Its not too thick or too watery, smell is kinda weird but not bad. I can tell as soon as a put it on my face that my skin looks better - its glowing. After using it consistently, my moderate acne has went away (not completely but theres a big difference). Also love that its cheaper than most serums but way better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Renee

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product 3 weeks ago. After using it for 5 days my skin broke out. I switched to tree of life and my skin cleared up after 3 days. I would not recommend using Dr Brenner if you have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Girlgameher

customer_reviews.title: Odd smell, but good product if you can get past that.
customer_reviews.text: Like that it’s the purest form of Vitamin C (L-ascorbic acid). It goes on smooth and has helped bringing some acne to the surface. The smell is SO odd though. Reminds me of deli meat. FYI... not meant to moisturize, I slather on face lotion after!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Smith

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my skin type
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work for me. I have extremely oily skin. I used this product once daily after my morning shower, and for about the first week, it slowed oil production in my face, which was great. But by the second week, the oil was back with a vengeance! The oil on my face increased the unpleasant scent of this product, which after applying to the skin, changes to a weird chemical/metallic smell. It did help lighten a couple of dark spots on my cheek. I used about half of the bottle and threw out the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Okay serum
customer_reviews.text: I personally did not really notice anything happen with this serum. It did make me a little brighter, and is very moisturizing, but other than that I can’t say it did much else. I bought this to remove my dark spots and acne scars which is my bad this product isn’t for that I misread it that it would but I think I got confused looking at so many serums lol but it’s not for that it’s not marketed for that. But since it is vitamin c serum it will improve your complexion, and it’s a good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great C E Ferulic serum
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning after cleansing and using my 2% Salicylic Acid Exfoliating Toner, before Hyaluronic serum and Niacinamide serum and SPF. This is better than the SkinCeuticals C E Ferulic due to 5% more L-Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) and it doesn't contain alcohol like the SkinCeuticals one, let alone costing 80% cheaper! Gives my face a great glow and helps absorb/prevent UV damage and stop free-radicals prematurely aging my face. A+ HG (holy grail) status. Best C E Ferulic serum. I will use this forever or until I find a product with the same ingredients for less.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Dr. Brenner's Vitamin C serum for about 2 weeks now and my skin looks truly radiant! Almost glowing. I have used vitamin c products on my face before and love the effects, but they were very expensive. This product offers the same results for much less. I will definitely continue using this product daily. Kathleen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loyal Amazon customer who never reviews, had to review this serum
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been an Amazon customer for 17 years and never review products, but made an exception for this serum. This product never arrives cloudy or orange-yellow in color the way Timeless’ L-ascorbic sometimes did when purchased through Amazon. I personally experience no irritation, and I absolutely love it. This serum keeps my sun spots at bay, and provides protection during the day against the elements. I use a lot of it on face, neck, décolletage and back of hands every single day.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah in Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch... need refund :(
customer_reviews.text: Eeekk....sub par from my 1st order. Highly dissatisfied. My 1st product was yellow and thin and felt so healthy. This feels like maple syrup and smells different. No beuno :(
customer_reviews.author: Bunni

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dupe for more expensive serums!
customer_reviews.text: I was not completely sold on this product after finishing a bottle of skinceauticals vitamin C serum, but this is just as effective! It also has not oxidized at all in 2 months. I will be buying again, this is a fantastic find! [also note: it does not irritate my sensitive acne-prone skin, but be sure to patch test first]
customer_reviews.author: kels_van

customer_reviews.title: Don’t know what you’re gonna get
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased this product and loved it. I started to run low so I ordered another and when I opened my new bottle it was the completely different. The smell and the consistency was not at all the same as what I had just been using. The product has barely any smell and is thick and goopy. I’m sending this back and reordering, hoping it was just a fluke.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A Appling

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: Brightens skin as promised. I'm concerned that its not stable though as in less than a week it's already changing color. UPDATE: Went bad real quick, less than a week. I would rate it a zero!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Oily makes face shiny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it has the same ingredients as Skinceuticals CE but a fraction of the price. I've had this product for a week. I've used other Vitamin C serums but this is my first time using this brand. It does go on oily, even a small dab, and doesn't absorb quickly. It makes your face shiny. That is my only complaint. I'm using to thinner serums that are absorbed quickly. With this brand, I have to wipe some off so I can apply my moisturizer if I don't have time to let it absorb.
customer_reviews.author: Writer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the antichrist of skincare. It smells horrendous so even if you start to look better, no one is coming anywhere near your face so what’s the point? Honestly it burned my skin off and smells so bad that no one wants what’s left. My skin peeled off in sheets. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: My husband’s wife

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product, and used it for about a week, when my skin started burning and I broke out in red spots all over my face. They turned into scabs like blisters. I will never use this product again and suggest you think twice about buying this product for yourself or anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Mizer

customer_reviews.title: effective
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a month, twice daily most of the time, and have noticed that a good amount of discoloration from sun damage/melasma/blemishes has faded or disappeared completely. My skin tone it more even now and overall brighter. The only negative I have noticed is that a rare pimple that would have healed up in a few days took far longer to heal, but the blemish left behind is finally starting to fade.
customer_reviews.author: MATru

customer_reviews.title: Meh--not a suitable replacement for Skinceuticals CE Feurilc
customer_reviews.text: This serum is fine and definitely worth the price, but I would not recommend it as a replacement for the expensive bottles despite the label claiming to contain the same ingredients. I suspected that would be the case given the $100+ price difference, but I will definitely buy the real thing next time.
customer_reviews.author: CFord

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality serum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this serum for the second time and this is why I am choosing it again: *not sticky *doen't cause breakouts *doesn't dry skin out *makes skin shiny and lighter
customer_reviews.author: lion_19

customer_reviews.title: Product not usable
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing. First time was fine so I reordered. Product was congealed like soft rubber. Could not use dropper for product and when I turned bottle upside down to pour product, big clumps of product slowly can out with shaking the. bottle. Will not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I’ve ordered it twice & will continue purchasing it!
customer_reviews.author: Uke player

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying hundred dollar serums for the last five years. I bought this on a whim and upon first application realized what a FOOL I have been! High quality ingredients and the GLOW is ridiculous. I’m oily combo, breakout prone, but also dry and dull and this does wonders for my skin. I 100% recommend this to anybody and everybody. This will be a staple for me from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: This is garbage
customer_reviews.text: This is garbage, broke me out horribly! The people giving this 5 stars were all given samples to try, probably different quality than people who actually bought it...terrible
customer_reviews.author: ADMIRA

customer_reviews.title: Sticky skin!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because it had all the ingredients I was looking for and also no added scent. I have only used it twice and I am very disappointed. Using only a few drops and applying it to my face and neck, it leaves my skin very sticky and I don't like the feel. I don't know what ingredient would make it feel sticky but I will discontue using.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good product
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to be a fine product; it was not sticky and I did not notice any scent. I do not think it moisturizes very much, but I bought it for fading ability anyway. I think the homemade version actually works better, but if you are not a DIYer, this will be a good alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm going to buy more.
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my face and the back of my hands. I was amazed how much better my hands look.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Streit

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: This has kind of been a holy grail product for me. I don’t think I’ve ever used a face product that had such immediate results. It makes my face look super radiant and glory. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: WomenBeShoppin’

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tested and used (I’m picky) - I approve!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally my first Amazon review ever and it is because I have ordered multiple brands of Vitamin C serum over the past 18 months and this is the only brand (2 times in a row) that had delivered a product packaged to maintain its purpose. Vitamin C serum works on your skin when it is at the right pH for your skin. For me that is 3.5. I recommend investing the $6 in pH strips to test your products. Both bottles I have received have tested right at 3.5. Keep it stored somewhere dark and not in a spot that gets warm. Your skin color will likely brighten within just one week.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: I can feel it tighten. my skin
customer_reviews.text: Great Vit C for my skin care routine. I can feel it working on my skin and I have only used about 2 weeks and can see the difference in clearer more vibrant skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Barwick

customer_reviews.title: Good formulation - delivers as promised
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best formulations of the triple three ingredients that work in synchronicity with eachother. Lightens over time and the formula is consistent and works if you are patient. Always wear sunscreen over this! A little sticky, but this is to be expected for the vit c ferulic acid combo and is not a formula issue at all. GREAT STUFF and GREAT VALUE!!!! I've done my research.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gave me eczema
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this serum -- it is very well-formulated, and a much cheaper alternative to the Skinceuticals original. I applied 3 drops on my face, and another 2 drops on my neck. Unfortunately, the skin around my neck became extremely red, dry, irritated, and itchy the next day. It has been one week since the first (and last) time I used this product, and my skin is still not remotely close to being completely healed.
customer_reviews.author: Miao

customer_reviews.title: Sticky but affordable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an affordable alternative to the expensive skinceuticals c e ferulic. Ive had it for about 3 weeks and my only complaint so far is it feels a bit sticky on my skin which I hate since I have very oily skin. But haven’t used long enough to gauge the results thoroughly. It doesn’t effect my makeup application.
customer_reviews.author: Payten&Chase

customer_reviews.title: Do not use if you have sensitive skin!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin but I’ve never had a product BURN me quite like this one. As soon as I put it on my skin flared, turned red and burned so bad. Even after I washed it off, it kept burning. My skin is now patchy with dryness and broke out due to the product. DO NOT USE.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A Stringer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for over a month now and I have no complaints. My complexion has definitely improved since using it. Goes on easy and is quickly absorbed. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M.

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and stinky
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is one of the worst Vitamin C serums I've tried. It's sticky and smelly. You can't wear it under make up (or even just under moisturizer). And it's too unpleasant to wear to bed.
customer_reviews.author: melissa butler

customer_reviews.title: Broke my skin out
customer_reviews.text: I never break out. This broke my skin out. Tried several times. Sticky also.
customer_reviews.author: JVH2468

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning. Great value compared to the expensive formulations I once bought from my dermatologist. Noticeable difference in my 60 year old skin since using this product. I use it on my face, neck, chest and hands. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: The key to your skins youthfulness!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my facial and body moisturizer daily. I have noticed a huge difference in my skin!!!!! Elasticity restored increase in collagen. This is a must have to any regimen. It reduces free radicals. The only way to see results using vitamin c is minimum of 20% potency. Do not expose vitamin c to light store in a dark place to prevent product from breaking down!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Not sure it works for me
customer_reviews.text: I really want to love this product for the price! I haven’t noticed any changes and I’ve been using since end of February. I will keep using it until it runs out but not sure I’d buy again
customer_reviews.author: Haley Tougher

customer_reviews.title: Less than one month of use and seems to be working very well.
customer_reviews.text: smells like vitamin c. Doesn't taste great if you get it near your mouth, but it glides on smoothly. I can see my skin looking brighter and it even feels a little tighter. I use this in conjunction with 100% pure Hyalauronic Acid for Skin (instaskin's brand, which is also a must-have).
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great!! Verrry comparable to high priced serums and the cost is so super affordable! I’ve noticed a nice glow and plumpness to my skin! I will repurchase it again instead of my drunk elephant c Firma. The only thing I would change is the packaging. I would LOVE to see a pump on this!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey J.

customer_reviews.title: Has a slight bacon-y smell but that's okay with me
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vitamin-c serum. I've wanted to try one for a long time, but I couldn't bring myself to buy the super expensive brand(s). I have nothing bad to say about the product. Maybe it's just me, but I think there is a slight bacon-y smell when you first put it on, but it disappears quickly. It's no problem because I don't mind a temporary bacon smell, makes me happy and I'm sure that makes me weird. I bought some for two of my daughters and they love it too!!
customer_reviews.author: Skate Mom

customer_reviews.title: The best stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many vitamin C serums before, and nothing comes close to this one. It’s faded very dark pigmentation that I have all over my face and is a staple in my beauty regimen!
customer_reviews.author: Rice

customer_reviews.title: Decent serum, bad smell.
customer_reviews.text: So the product itself isn’t bad, but I didn’t really notice any difference in my skin. What I did notice was a really gross metallic smell. It smells like a dirty coin. The smell stays on your skin all day.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Drying & gritty under 30 days
customer_reviews.text: This came highly recommended. But within a month it became gritty, like rubbing salt on my face. Very drying as well. I will stick with Maelove glow maker, or Timeless.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Product oxidized before using
customer_reviews.text: Product oxidized before initial usage. I am currently asking for an exchange and will update this review once I get said replacement.
customer_reviews.author: klin
